TopicTitle: Anyone else catch this from Scott Manley's stream?

Articles.Content:
Scott Manley will be having a "special stream" next Saturday, but he can't tell us what it is:

[https://youtu.be/pChmQz6FpR0?t=600](https://youtu.be/pChmQz6FpR0?t=600)

Hopefully it will be KSP and not some other game, and hopefully he'll be allowed to show us 1.0 stuff!
It wouldn't surprise me if he was streaming 1.0 next week, given the Countdown. Media release is usually a few days before the update drops.

Didn't catch that - I'm selective with what I watch on his channel, but I have noticed his recent KSP videos, and they appear to be fillers, so it wouldn't surprise me if we get a 1.0 preview on Saturday. That plus the fact that the Kerbal Kountdown is now at 7 (days).

Wouldn't doubt that he would do something 1.0 related. He has also confirmed he doesn't really want to show too much KSP because "I don't want to show anything that hasn't been shown in the livestreams," or something along those lines.

> 
> Didn't catch that - I'm selective with what I watch on his channel, but I have noticed his recent KSP videos, and they appear to be fillers, so it wouldn't surprise me if we get a 1.0 preview on Saturday. That plus the fact that the Kerbal Kountdown is now at 7 (days).

Yep, he's been doing fillers, he said he wouldn't do another "series" until 1.0 after he ended Interstellar Quest. I think some of his fillers involve a lot of showcasing the mods he plans to use in the next series though, the rest well.. SpaceX and of course SCIENCE!
Well, he already did a 2 hour stream for the ARM patch, so yep... Surely it will 1.0

I watched that part of the livestream he posted to YouTube. I almost got on here and said something about how he had pretty much gave the whole thing away. Because people were still trying to get the Venera 9 reference for the "Kountdown"..

The KSP Facebook page announced that KSP TV will be streaming 1.0 this weekend, starting at 4pm I think (dont remember which time zone). They said they're really trying to have 24hour coverage until release. Scott Manley was listed as one of the presenters. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> The KSP Facebook page announced that KSP TV will be streaming 1.0 this weekend, starting at 4pm I think (dont remember which time zone). They said they're really trying to have 24hour coverage until release. Scott Manley was listed as one of the presenters. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

For once this hasn't been just posted on Facebook. It's actually been posted here too: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116340-Twitch-Thursday-KSPTV-to-stream-KSP-1-0](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116340-Twitch-Thursday-KSPTV-to-stream-KSP-1-0)
